name: Money Connect
description:
Build your own money factory. Connect plugs strategically and earn more money.
These cables are son SATISFYING to hold and swing around.

You can't make a fortune without making a penny.

With this rope mechanic you will enjoy earning money most.
developers: G PLAY STUDIO OYUN VE YAZILIM ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: G PLAY STUDIO OYUN VE YAZILIM ANONIM SIRKETI
